dcterms:description: A dataset containing piano sheet music images sourced from the International Music Score Library Project (IMSLP), used for training language models for composer style classification.
dcterms:title: IMSLP Dataset

dcterms:creator: Daniel Yang
Thitaree Tanprasert
Teerapat Jenrungrot
Mengyi Shan
TJ Tsai
dcterms:description: A representation of sheet music that encodes the position of filled noteheads relative to the staff lines, used for converting sheet music images into a sequence of words for classification tasks.
dcterms:title: Bootleg Score Representation

dcterms:description: A subset of the IMSLP dataset that has been curated and labeled for the purpose of training classifiers to predict the composer of piano sheet music.
dcterms:title: Target Data

dcterms:description: A term used to describe the sampled fragments from the target data for training classifiers in a balanced manner.
dcterms:title: Proxy Task Data
